title: News: Son Lux announces new album
body:
Ryan Lott, better known under his stage name Son Lux, has announced his new album Lanterns will be released on the 29th of October on the Indianapolis based label Joyful Noise.

Combining his careful classical composition with sleek production it promises to be big.

The post rock hip-hopper and experimental musician gained recognition for his 2008 debut EP [_At War With Walls and Mazes_](http://pitchfork.com/reviews/albums/11178-at-war-with-walls-mazes/). He later went on to release the Beak & Claw EP as part of **s/s/s** with **Sufjan Stevens** and **Serengeti**.

In addition to CD & Digital releases, Joyful Noise will be releasing two versions of limited edition vinyl. The [VIP edition vinyl](http://www.joyfulnoiserecordings.com/son-lux-lanterns-deluxe-vip-edition.html) comes hand-numbered, and thumb-printed in silver by Son Lux himself.

Stream “Lost it To Trying” from the upcoming release below and pre order Lanterns from Joyful Noise [here](http://www.joyfulnoiserecordings.com/son-lux/).
